translation.text: https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW - Train #2238 Will Not Operate
Train #2238, scheduled to depart Big Timber Road/Elgin will not operate. Train #2240, scheduled to depart Big Timber Road/Elgin at 2:22 p.m., will accommodate passengers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Train #2213 will not operate past Elgin, Train #2215 will accommodate
MDW train #2213, scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road/Elgin at 11:52 PM, will not operate past Elgin due to an earlier vehicle struck by a train. Train #2215 will accommodate customers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW - Train #2215 Will Terminate at National St./Elgin

Train #2215, scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road at 12:52 p.m., will terminate at National St./Elgin.  Train #2217, scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road/Elgin at 1:52 p.m., will accommodate passengers.  This train may be operating up to 45 minutes late.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS #809 Extensively Delayed
SWS #809, scheduled to depart Chicago at 11:42 am, is operating with extensive delays due to operational issues.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW - Train #2236 Delayed/Moving
Train #2236, scheduled to depart Big Timber Road/Elgin at 12:22 p.m., has originated from Hanover Park and may be operating 25 to 30 minutes behind schedule.  Updated at 1:09 p.m.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF Train #1233 Will Not Operate
Due to mechanical problems, inbound train #1233, scheduled to depart Chicago at 2:33 p.m., will not operate.  Train #1239, scheduled to depart Chicago at 3:10 p.m., will accommodate passengers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW - Inbound and Outbound Train Service Fully Restored
Inbound and outbound train service is fully restored.  Extensive delays are anticipated.  Please visit metratracker.com for the location of your train. Updated at 1:18 p.m.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF and SWS Customers May Experience Platform Arrival Delays at Chicago Union Station
BNSF and SWS customers may experience platform arrival delays at Chicago Union Station.    A minor Amtrak derailment is blocking access to some platforms.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS #818 Delayed Departure

SWS train #818, scheduled to depart 179th Street/Orland Park at 1:12 PM, will be delayed in departure due to an operational incident. The duration of this delay is unknown. Metra will provide updates as information becomes available.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RID #415 Delayed
RID train #415, scheduled to depart LaSalle Street Station at 12:55 PM, is operating 20 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to earlier mechanical problems.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
